trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>이벤트 발생만 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>제어 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>속성을 설정 또는 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>속성은 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event is useful when you want to display a shortcut menu determined by a row's current state or the values it contains.
trans-unit.target: 처리는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>이벤트는 행의 현재 상태 또는 포함 된 값에 의해 결정 되는 바로 가기 메뉴를 표시 하려는 경우에 유용 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a row unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event overrides the shortcut menu for the specific cell that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 처리 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>이벤트 처리기에서 지정 하는 바로 가기 메뉴가 표시 됩니다 때마다 마우스 행 경우가 아니면는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>이벤트 재정의 클릭 된 특정 셀에 대 한 바로 가기 메뉴.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks a row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>이벤트는 또한 될 때마다 발생의 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>검색 하거나 프로그래밍 방식으로 또는 행을 클릭할 때.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> property to determine the state of a row or the values it contains, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>속성을 행 이나 포함 된 값의 상태를 확인 하 고이 정보를 사용 하 여 변경 하거나 수정 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 행의 값으로 초기화 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>이벤트 값을 무시 하는 속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> value for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: 처리는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>많은 행을 설정의 작업할 때 이벤트 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>여러 행에 대 한 값.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [Windows Forms DataGridView 컨트롤의 크기 조정에 대 한 유용한](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 처리 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [NIB: 이벤트 사용](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the `rowIndex` parameter value to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자는 `rowIndex` 초기화 매개 변수 값의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row.
trans-unit.target: 행의 인덱스입니다.

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndex-1 보다 작은 경우

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut menu for the row that raised the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 발생 하는 행에 대 한 바로 가기 메뉴를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: This property initially contains the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property if it has been set for a row.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성의 값을 처음에 포함 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>행에 대해 설정 된 경우 속성을 사용 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> in use.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> in use.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the row that is requesting a shortcut menu.
trans-unit.target: 바로 가기 메뉴를 요청 하는 행의 인덱스를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to retrieve additional information about the row.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 사용 하 여 행에 대 한 추가 정보를 검색 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row that is requesting a shortcut menu.
trans-unit.target: 바로 가기 메뉴를 요청 하는 행의&0;부터 시작 하는 인덱스입니다.
